website_summaries.verdict: If you want to save some money and enjoy a variety of stellar soy-based scents, this candle gift set is worth your consideration.
pros: Includes Spring Fresh, Lavender, Cider, and Violet scents
of burn time per soy wax candle
cons: Some may prefer a larger option instead of “travel sized” candles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: These will be a perfect Christmas gift for my friend who goes crazy for candles all her life. These came in a very nice box which can be used as a gift box. All 4 scents are amazing. I'm thinking about buying 1 more set for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how this has such a high rating.
customer_reviews.text: There’s a large ring of wax that just doesn’t melt with a giant hole in the middle where it did. I feel like it’s a waste of candle. They smell great out of the box but when lit, you can’t smell it unless your nose is right next to the candle. The packaging is pretty as are the containers each candle is held it but it’s a bad product overall. No point in scented candles if you can’t smell it and money is wasted on wax that doesn’t melt all the way through. Purchased as stocking stuffer gifts but have changed my mind once I realized it’s a bad candle product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: From the first moment I open the door of the mail locker. It was amazing the delicious odor coming out. These candles are the most fine and scented i ever buy. My car, the package while I was walking to my door. Thank you very much I really recomend this product and of course I will suscribe to have them at my house all year 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Lillith

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift for a co-worker along with another set of different scents to use while recovering from major surgery. I asked her what she thought and she said they small great. These also came in beautiful packaging making gifting it easy. She loves the tins they come in and plans on reusing them once she finished the candles. Because she liked these so much, I will probably by a set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonCapri

customer_reviews.title: Small and lacks a lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t worth it all. Each candle was smaller than expected. It was advertised as 16 oz. candles, but you’re actually getting four 4 oz. candles. The aroma goes away once you light it. The only thing you pay for is the packaging. Otherwise, I could buy better and cheaper scented candles elsewhere. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging, lovely scent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of these candles and was so impressed with the tins and the box they are in that I ordered two more for gifts! I haven’t burned the candles yet, but all smell lovely. They are the perfect size for traveling. Anyone would be very happy to receive them as a gift, I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute hostess gift
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice hostess gift, or "thinking of you" or a small "thank you" gift. I wouldn't say they are high quality by any means but they are not tacky if you take off the plastic wrapping that comes on it. The smell is not overwhelming and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very cute candles , nice decoration and also smell good. But they are only burning on one side when lighted so approximatively half of them have melted and now I can’t use them anymore. Too bad !
customer_reviews.author: gerault

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open, smell is okay but presentation is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous candles. They look better than they smell if I’m honest but the presentation is beautiful. My chief complaint is that they’re nearly impossible to open! The tins come with a ribbon that peeks out that you’re supposed to pull to open but they shred as you pull and the suction tightens the tin to where my husband was questioning his manliness at his inability to open..
customer_reviews.author: Jess Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Loved the packaging presentation
customer_reviews.text: Gave as stocking stuffers. Read past reviews about being tough to get the lid off. Hard but not impossible. It has a satin piece of trim across the inside of the lid that you pull on to help remove the lid. Not for your grandma or elderly aunt, unless you have awesome hand strength. Everyone was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer gentry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this too give as a gift so not sure about the scent that's why I only have it 4 stars but they were nicely wrapped and the canisters were very pretty. I would get one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M

customer_reviews.title: Smell and look good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as prizes for a bridal shower, so I cannot comment on how they burn, but they smelled very nice and the tins were very pretty. They were cute prizes and served well for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Candles won’t burn down all the way.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good buy for gift or self used. Too small for gift and the scent is not good. Candle burns down in an strange way. It’s a cute little jar, yes, but you have to work hard to remove the thick layer of remaining wax around the jar because the corduroy’s flame couldn’t reach all of the wax except the very middle of the candles. Scents are not good as well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the romantic smell!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the romantic atmosphere, And I often need candles.This set of candles is much better than I expected. I like the beautifully packaging. The colors and patterns are very stylish.and they smell like a light fragrance instead of a pungent one.They burn for a long time, and their quality is much higher than their price.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Johansson

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: they are cute and smell great. they burn kind of fast but the packaging is adorable, nice as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite packing is suitable for giving to the person you like
customer_reviews.text: My friend gave me a gift two months ago, I like the wrapping of the gift very much, when I opened it, the taste was very charming, I fell in love with the smell. I often use it, it does not have strong chemical smell, I think it is natural soy wax as advertised, I think it is healthy, so I found the same product on amazon, I have given it to my mother as a beautiful gift.She loves the smell of lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Miller

customer_reviews.title: You may steal this for yourself if you bought it for a gift
customer_reviews.text: My sister absolutely loved this it smells a great. I almost didnt wanna gift it because I wanted one for myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next time I decided to try the lavender flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves aromatherapy so much that I gave her scented candles as a gift.After receiving the product, I really like its natural fragrance and non-stimulation. Since it can relieve pressure and improve the body, I used it by myself, so I had to buy a new set for her. I like the taste of spring very much and I hope she will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Anderson

customer_reviews.title: price increase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 9.99. Bought one set because I wanted to give them for gifts. Have to see and smell them first. Bought them, and they were acceptable for the price, but when I went back to purchase more, the price went up my almost 50%. Good value for 9.99, less so for 15.99
customer_reviews.author: Tootsjofus

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Cute but MUCH smaller than expected not impressed for using as a gift. Smell good but doesn't smell much even after being lit for a while if you like highly scented candles these are not good. I am very disappointed actually
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I need moree!! These are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable! The package it comes in is cute, the containers are nice, and the smells are amazing. I want to buy a lot more.. lol
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I brought these. Nice scents and the containers are so pretty. You can also reuse the containers. I will be buying more for upcoming birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Daisymay

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift it's is very pretty and good gift for the price
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I received these candles.The scent is pleasant but not overpowering like other candles I've bought in the past. Also it's nice that each candle comes inside it's own unique jar with matching lid and the box matches as well which makes them very giftable. I got these as a gift for my sister and I'm sure she's going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabino Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Looked good for a small gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift never saw it. Haven't heard from the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: m.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought one set to give as a gift and they were a huge hit. I plan on ordering a bunch more to keep on hand to gift clients- they look really sharp and NOT cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Cat W

customer_reviews.title: candles
customer_reviews.text: jars are nice, love the fragrance and the candles come in a gift box
customer_reviews.author: Joan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and store, good quality, I like it very much.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time, very attractive, burning evenly, no black smoke, burning for a long time, improve the emotional atmosphere, suitable for various festivals, easy to carry and store, good quality, like.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Unique and beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. My friend was very impressed. Thought they were very pretty and unique. The scents are great and not just the same old thing you always find. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Get them! You will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing! They smell nice and came in a super cute gift box! I am a very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Marijah

customer_reviews.title: No scent, skip these candles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. No scent, very disappointed. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carole V. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: Good beautiful and beautiful candle it was neat that you could use them after you get done
customer_reviews.author: rebecca Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Moderate
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price looks kinda cheap for a present
customer_reviews.author: Ambra Nicole Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Bautiful Gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soy candle set. The scents are exquisite. The tins that they come in are so decorative. The box that they are in is very beautiful, giftable box....No need to gift wrap or to put them in a gift bag, saves money. I highly recommend these great soy candles...Especially for gifting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Collins

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is beautiful, too
customer_reviews.text: They smell good, the smell is so pleasant, the candles are well packed and of good quality.It burns evenly and is good as a gift.I love it
customer_reviews.author: menrilina

customer_reviews.title: I like candles very much. They make me feel better
customer_reviews.text: I like this set of candles very much. When I have guests coming, I like to light them. I can smell the candles in the whole house, and they actually last a long time, which is amazing. These candles just make me relax. They make me feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Elam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles are so amazing. They came super fast and my wife absolutely loves them. The scent quality is amazing and I will definitely be buying more for wife in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Clairday

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for candle lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my sister-in-law. She loved them!
customer_reviews.author: SBG

customer_reviews.title: Burn down super fast.
customer_reviews.text: Did not have a strong scent. Biggest problem was very short burn time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kate Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: 2 Smell Good
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 smelled really good. The other 2 are going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Hostess gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to a friend as a hostess gift, she loved them. So did everyone else at the party.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Anarchy

customer_reviews.title: Smell great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell and how I could easily add the candles to holiday or birthday gift bags!
customer_reviews.author: Bumper

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice style container I plan to give as gifts
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They smell good. The modelling is very beautiful, suit to put inside at home very much.
customer_reviews.author: Randle March

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice these were. I basically was able to split them up and do 4 really nice small gifts that looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Give your loved one a favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday gift for my wife. The packaging is so delicate and the taste is also very good. My wife likes it very much. I would recommend more friends to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Toby

customer_reviews.title: Goog
customer_reviews.text: I received the product. As soon as it arrived, I couldn't wait to give it a try to my dog. The effect was very good. I highly recommend you to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my birthday present to my girlfriend.the package is very beautiful.she likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Ashburn

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok gift. Value wise not so great, burns unevenly- doesn't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very like
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is very strong, but it is still good to smell. The elegant fragrance is a little bit more rich and sweet. In short,it’s not so light,but not so strong and pungent
customer_reviews.author: Kerwin Coverdale

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandma for Christmas on a whim and honestly they are amazing. She loves all the scents and they were packaged so pretty for her. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very perfect product, natural taste, I am very satisfied with this shopping!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty presentation, great candles.
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived. Packaging was pretty,candles were correct. The note was note the one I typed though. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these candles! The package is adorable and would make a perfect gift! All candles have an amazing smell and they burn even! Perfect for any room in the house! The tins are decorative and make the perfect decor and scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: All the candles smelt amazingggg ! I lit the candle in my room on the second floor but smelt the candle in my living room! Def will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Scent is most important!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When lite fragrance was pretty much non existent. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Holm

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wax don't get melt altogether and thus left out with one side meltdown. Such a waste😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute packaging, okay candles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tins, but don't burn for very long and scents are very lite.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: NO SMELL
customer_reviews.text: cute packaging but no smell what at all even when its lite for 1 hour +. only good thing is its pretty
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: They smell nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mom and she loves them. They smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a friend. The friend has told me multiple times how much she loves the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna nattress

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Scented Candles
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic candles. I bought these usually from local shops but I won't be anymore. Great scent!
customer_reviews.author: Piper Z

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandma
customer_reviews.text: this the perfect gift, the packaging is so pretty you do not have wrap and sent on them are good but not over powering
customer_reviews.author: Amanda1013

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love the choice and smells of candles and just perfect size gift box)
customer_reviews.author: Irina S.

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to like these because they would make a lovely gift. The containers are very pretty, and come in a very nice box, but the fragrance is much too light. I had a candle burning for hours and could barely smell it. For that reason I was very disappointed and would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these candles is amazing! The gift box, the design on the candle tins, the fragrances of the candles themselves... The scents are fabulous and the look of each candle is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: kelly chase

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation & great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas gifts and everyone has loved them. I split them into individual gifts. That worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A Kurten

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them, and I gave them as a present to my sisters and they love it too, they smell great
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kern

customer_reviews.title: Unable to open.
customer_reviews.text: I love the gift box.I am unable to open the candle tins.I have tried everything still won’t open very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Meixner

customer_reviews.title: Easy holidy gift
customer_reviews.text: You don't even have to wrap this one honestly. Package is super festive and makes a great gift for candle lovers.
customer_reviews.author: nekosama

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to open!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very small and impossible to get open. I couldn’t open any of the 4 that I received so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these candles you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very well made.Plus they smell fabulous! They burned evenly and all the way to the bottom. The tins are exceptional quality and attractive. They are very heavy and re-usable.I had purchased them to make my own candles once they were burned. Could not ask for a better result.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. The tins are so pretty as well as the packaging. The best wishes card inside is a nice touch. The scents are great too. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute gift, especially for the price. I haven’t lit them so not sure how they smell but I’ll prob buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candle to use as a gift. The candles come in colorful tins, and the box they come it is beautiful and the smells are nice. I kept it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Arnett

customer_reviews.title: SECRET SANTA
customer_reviews.text: A well received Secret Santa gift for my church group. Loved that it was soy and small enough to travel with.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift, scents aren't too strong.
customer_reviews.text: Look great, nice easy gift. Scents are not too strong therefore don't really fill a room

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and quality candles!
customer_reviews.text: Candles as described! They smell great and nice quality too! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: smelll divine
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great candles with an awesome fragrance. I could smell them before I opened the package, but it was a nice fragrance.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift !

product_meta.title: Large Size Scented Candles Gifts Sets for Women-Gardenia, Lavender, Jasmine and Vanilla, Natural Soy Wax Travel Tin Fragrance Gift for Valentine's Day Birthday Mother's Day Bath Yoga
feature_bullets: ✔4 POPULAR FRAGRANCE - Scented candles gift set with 4 pack, which includes 4 Fragrances- Gardenia, Lavender, Jasmine and Vanilla
✔NATURAL SOY WAX - Made with 100% natural soy wax, evenly burning and produce no black smoke, more healthier, harmless to human body and environment.
✔LONG LASTING TIME - Size: L2.95’’ x H 2.95’’, 120g (4.4 oz) per candle.Burn Hour: 75 hours. Providing aromatherapy, creating mood enhancing atmospheres, Relaxation for you and guests.

✔PORTABLE REUSABLE TRAVEL TIN - Candle containers are cute & attractive, suit for decorating your home or store some little things once used up.Mini travel design make it convenient for carry to vacation and easy to pack for travel without worrying about the containers breaking.

✔PERFECT GIFT SET - Aromatherapy candle comes in a beautiful gift box.They are appropriate for any holiday or special event,such as birthday, holiday, anniversary , Mother's Day gift or just to say thank you to anyone.
